cluster.name: Flow Measurement
cluster.description: This cluster provides an interface to flow measurement functionality, including configuration and provision of notifications of flow measurements.

history.description: New data model format and notation

attributes.name: MeasuredValue
attributes.description: MeasuredValue represents the flow in mÂ³/h as follows: MeasuredValue = 10 x Flow. The null value indicates that the flow measurement is unknown, otherwise the range SHALL be as described in Measured Value.

attributes.name: MinMeasuredValue
attributes.description: The MinMeasuredValue attribute indicates the minimum value of MeasuredValue that can be measured. The null value indicates that the value is not available.

attributes.name: MaxMeasuredValue
attributes.description: The MaxMeasuredValue attribute indicates the maximum value of MeasuredValue that can be measured. The null value indicates that the value is not available.
